text: The 1922 Marquette Golden Avalanche football team was an American football team that represented Marquette University as an independent during the 1922 college football season. In its first season under head coach Frank Murray, the team compiled an 8–0–1 record, shut out eight of its nine opponents, and outscored all opponents by a total of 213 to 3. ==Schedule== ==References== Marquette Category:Marquette Golden Avalanche football seasons Category:College football undefeated seasons Marquette Golden Avalanche football
title: 1922 Marquette Golden Avalanche football team
